description: Open. Flexible. Built to adapt to your teamâ€™s AI needs. DataRobot brings all your generative and predictive workflows together into one powerful platform. Quickly deliver AI that your business needs,, govern all your assets, and tap into world-class AI experts.
title: DataRobot AI Platform | Deliver Value from AI
introduction: DataRobot AI Platform is a comprehensive solution that offers a wide range of features for organizations to leverage AI effectively. It is available through annual subscription plans and can be customized to meet specific business goals. The platform provides tools for interactive notebooks, no-code data prep, automated feature discovery, deep learning, and more.
pricing: The DataRobot AI Platform is priced as an annual subscription, allowing organizations to tailor their solution to meet their specific needs and business objectives. It can be purchased directly through DataRobot, via authorized partners, or on popular cloud marketplaces like Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud.

faqs.question: How is the DataRobot AI Platform priced?
faqs.answer: The DataRobot AI Platform is available as an annual subscription, and organizations can customize their solution to incorporate the functionality they need to meet their business goals.
